verses.verse: And it came<WH1961> about in the sixth<WH8345> year,<WH8141> on the fifth<WH2568> [day] of the sixth<WH8345> month,<WH2320> as I was sitting<WH3427> in my house<WH1004> with the elders<WH2205> of Judah<WH3063> sitting<WH3427> before<WH6440> me, that the hand<WH3027> of the Lord<WH136> God<WH3068> fell<WH5307> on me there.<WH8033>
